授業目的:
"Environmental Toxicology" is the correct name or real title of the lecture name with the purpose of:
1. Obtaining some comprehensive knowledge of fundamental & recent knowledge of Environmental and Toxicology
2. Students will be familiars with the problem and problem solver of Environmental Toxicology
到達目標: This Environmental Toxicology could contribute and support their future research or carrier. Furthermore becoming familiar and more proficient at reading and critiquing references or literature
授業方法: The theories, flowchart, pathway, and video-related Environmental Toxicology will be taught via slides of PowerPoints. Some of the questions will be given to students in order to evaluate their understanding of this lecture.

第5回: How Do We Determine if a Chemical is Harmful
第6回: Risk Assessment (Hazard Identification, Dose Response Assessment)-1
第7回: Risk Assessment (Hazard Identification, Dose Response Assessment)-2
第9回: Risk Assessment (Exposure Assessment and Risk Characterization)
第11回: Risk Management and Personal Protection Equipment
第12回: Various effect of Toxic chemical to human body
第13回: Various effect of Toxic chemical to flora and fauna
第14回: How Do We Explain to Stakeholders (Risk Communication/Risk Perception)
トピック.授業外学習2: Master students have to prepare by themselves concerning the knowledge of Environmental Toxicology based on the textbook or international journal that we offer as references. During the class, there will be a temporary discussion in order to evaluate whether the students understand or not.
